dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:6,500,000 (E 65°0'--E 97°0'/N 37°30'--N 15°0'). Relief shown pictorially. Prime meridian: Ferro. Bar scales given in"mill. Germanica" and"mill. Gallica".
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dct_publisher_sm: Ex officina I. Covens et C. Mortier; Amsterdam
dcat_keyword_sm: South Asia Maps Early Works to 1800
